messages.message: created new account for non-prod today. when I try to test api requests on Postman on localhost (https://localhost/api/v1/classifier/run) it returns “404 Not found, requested url was not found on the server” which seems to happen if the user isn’t a site-wide admin. I created a new access token as well.  seems i’m not a site-wide admin because i can’t see the Admin app?

If it were related to permissions, the error would probably still complete and you’d see an access denied error. If it’s a 404 that likely means your route isn’t quite right? Is this a postman request you’ve made before? Can you change the logs of nginx and of api-server-apps logs to see if the request is making it there?
thanks! not sure what changed but it’s working now :slightly_smiling_face: so all good (for now)
cool! sounds kine of like your api-server-apps wasn’t up and running
